org.semanticweb.kaon2.extensionapi.datatype
Interface DatatypeHandler

public interface DatatypeHandler

Handles tasks related to a particular datatype, such as recognising whether a Java object is an instance of the datatype, creating the Java object corresponding to the string representation, and producing the string representation of a Java object.

Method Summary
 int getArity()
          Returns the arity of the datatype.
 java.lang.String getDatatypeURI()
          Returns the URI of the datatype.
 boolean isDatatypeInstance(java.lang.Object object)
          Returns true if the supplied object is in this datatype.
 java.lang.Object parseObject(java.lang.String objectValue)
          Creates an object of this datatype having the given string representation.
 java.lang.String toString(java.lang.Object object)
          Creates the string representation of an object.
